createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.info: Your account was created! After you verified your account in the email we sent you, you can log into your account.

landing.login: Log In To An Existing Account

errors.usernameToShort: Username should be at least 4 Characters long.
errors.passwordNotLongEnough: Password should be at least 8 Characters long.
errors.shouldContainNumber: Password should contain at least one number.
errors.shouldContainNormalChar: Password should contain at least one letter character.
errors.shouldContainSpecialChar: Password should contain at least one special character.
errors.gameNameToShort: Name should be at least 3 Characters long.

wait.qrcodeInfo: Other Player an join the game directly with the QRCode.

test-1.title: Test Rule
test-1.info: Test rule description - optional extrem long text...

recaptcha.title: I'm not a robot
recaptcha.error: Some error occurred in the checking process. - Please retry later.

result.fail: Failed Bot Check! - Please retry later.
result.half: Result: Cyborg, but that's ok try acting less like a bot in the future.

auth.name: Authentication Cookies
auth.description: We use cookies to store your login session across multiple browser session, so that you don't have to re-enter your credentials every time you visit.

recaptcha.name: Google reCAPTCHA Cookies
recaptcha.description: We use Google reCAPTCHA in order to prevent spam. Google reCAPTCHA needs cookies in order to analyze your interactions with the website.

disallowed.title: Missing Cookies
disallowed.info: Login- and account-creation functionality needs Google reCAPTCHA cookies enabled. Please change your settings and try again.
